revised_title: A Method of Differences Applied to Series Whose Sums are Obtained by Landen
tldr: The author, Benjamin Gompertz, presents a method of differences to solve series whose sums are obtained by Mr. Landen using impossible quantities. This method can be applied to series of sines and cosines, and it offers a simple and efficient way to find the sums of these series. The author demonstrates the method through various examples and discusses its applications and limitations.
